channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM Corporation -- Business Process Manager Advanced
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM Corporation -- Business Process Manager Advanced

item.title: CVE-2017-1159|2024-08-05T13:25:17.473Z -- ibm%20corporation -- business%20process%20manager%20advanced
item.description: IBM Business Process Manager 8.0 and 8.5 could allow a remote attacker to conduct phishing attacks, using an open redirect attack. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to spoof the URL displayed to redirect a user to a malicious Web site that would appear to be trusted. This could allow the attacker to obtain highly sensitive information or conduct further attacks against the victim. IBM X-Force ID: 122891.
